translations: n.（Gall）人名；（英）高尔；（法、德、俄、意、罗、捷、塞）加尔

sentences.sentence: Then they had the gall to complain!
sentences.translation: 而且他们居然还有脸抱怨！

sentences.sentence: He has the gall to accuse reporters of exploiting a tragedy for their own ends.
sentences.translation: 他竟厚颜无耻地指责记者利用一场悲剧来谋求他们的私利。

sentences.sentence: "Brimstone and gall," thundered Hook, "what cozening is going on here!"
sentences.translation: “该死，”胡克怒吼道，“这是怎么回事！”
